content: Dine at Grand Tavern, a new modern American concept from acclaimed Chef David Burke and ESquared Hospitality. Relax at the Chameleon Lounge or take in sweeping rooftop views of the city at Angad Rainbow Terrace while sipping hand-crafted cocktails in a space designed for sharing and socializing. Guests can also experience the flavor of Grand Tavern in the hotel’s Playroom or in the comfort of your room.
